text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, the Corp adds exactly 5 cards from Archives to HQ, if able. If they do, they trash 5 cards from HQ at random.
title: Glut Cipher

text: +3[mu] Use the MU on Knobkierie only for virus programs. The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may place 1 virus counter on an installed virus program. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Knobkierie

flavor: "Is there anything better than free money?"
text: The first time the Corp installs a card each turn, you may expose that card unless the Corp pays 1[credit].
title: 419: Amoral Scammer

flavor:
"I'm sorry, sir, we weren't expecting you! You look different than I remember..."
"Haircut."
text: Name a card type. Expose a card in a remote server, then gain 5[credit] if the exposed card has the named card type.
title: Falsified Credentials

text:
Place 18[credit] from the bank on Rogue Trading when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Rogue Trading, trash it.
[click], [click]: Take 6[credit] from Rogue Trading and take 1 tag.
title: Rogue Trading

flavor: At least this time around, the graphic was family-friendly.
text: Run a remote server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, you may force the Corp to shuffle all cards in the root of that server into R&D.
title: Because I Can

flavor: Speed gets you in, intuition gets you out.
text:
When you install this program, place 3 power counters on it.
Whenever you breach R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to access 1 additional card.
title: Nyashia

flavor:
"It 'ate' the vertex grid?! What does that even mean?"
- Nkiru QiÅ«, Asa Group sysop
text:
Whenever you trash a Corp card, you may place 1 virus counter on Consume.
[click]: Gain 2[credit] for each hosted virus counter, then remove all virus counters from Consume.
title: Consume

flavor: A Model G21V Tracker, Malia Z0L0K4 excels at locating assignments and subduing them.
text: When you rez this asset, choose 1 installed non-virtual resource. The chosen resource loses its printed abilities.
title: Malia Z0L0K4

flavor: "Don't worry, he won't feel a thing! Probably."
text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. While the Runner is accessing an agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. Whenever an agenda is accessed or scored, Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage.
title: Kill Switch

text:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, Trace[3]. If successful, the Runner must lose [click][click] or suffer 1 core damage.
title: Tempus

flavor: Many things go in. Nothing comes out.
text: Install only in a remote server. Bio Vault can be advanced. [trash], 2 hosted advancement tokens: End the run.
title: Bio Vault

text:
[subroutine] Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and either arrange them in any order or shuffle R&D. You may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] You may trash 1 card in HQ. If you do, trash 1 resource. Trash Sadaka.
title: Sadaka

flavor: "Has anyone ever actually read one of these things?" - 419
text:
[subroutine]End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
[subroutine]End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
[subroutine]End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
[subroutine]End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
[subroutine]End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
[subroutine]End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
title: Endless EULA

flavor: Your first dog, your favorite food, your own mother's name. Your love, your hate, your fear. Hopes and dreams, pain and sorrow. All of it, everything, slips away.
text:
[subroutine]Add an installed Runner card to the grip.
[subroutine]Add an installed Runner card to the grip.
title: Sandman

flavor: Azmari EdTech's most popular instructor, Amani Senai regularly broadcasts to millions of students.
text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may trace[X]. If successful, add an installed Runner card to the grip. X is the advancement requirement of the scored or stolen agenda.
title: Amani Senai

text: When your turn ends, you may choose a piece of ice with no advancement tokens on it. If you do, place 1 advancement token on that piece of ice for each agenda point on all installed faceup agendas.
title: SSO Industries: Fueling Innovation

text:
Install City Works Project faceup.
When the Runner accesses City Works Project while it is installed, do 2 meat damage and 1 additional meat damage for each advancement token on it.
title: City Works Project

text:
When the Runner encounters Oduduwa, place 1 advancement token on it. You may place X advancement tokens on another piece of ice. X is the number of advancement tokens on Oduduwa.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Oduduwa

flavor: She gets the job done. And then some.
text: When your turn begins, you may trash Rashida Jaheem to gain 3[credit] and draw 3 cards.
title: Rashida Jaheem
